text.div:
Name Type

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
... No suggested values defineddeprecatedadded v2.8.2, removed after v2.8.2
A AssignedA name assigned to a person. Reasons some organizations assign alternate names may include not knowing the person's name, or to maintain anonymity. Some, but not necessarily all, of the name types that people call "alias" may fit into this category.added v2.3
B Birth nameA name that a person had shortly after being born. Usually for family names but may be used to mark given names at birth that may have changed later. This is not for temporary names assigned at birth while a newborn is not yet namedadded v2.3.1
BAD Bad NameA name that was wrongly used in the past and is now maintained only for the purposes of searchingadded v2.7
C Adopted NameA name acquired by adoptionadded v2.3
D Customary NameKnown as/conventional/the one you use. May also be known asa preferred name.added v2.3
F Fathers NameFathers Name ( Patronymic Name)added v2.8
I Licensing Nameadded v2.4
K Business nameA name used in a Professional or Business context. Also includes writer’s pseudonym, artist’s name, stage name, street name, etc. An example of use is where a person with multiple proper names (i.e. married) uses one of the particular names in a professionaladded v2.6
L Official Registry NameThe formal name as registered in an official (government) registry, but which name might not be commonly used. May correspond to legal name For many people, customary name is also their official nameadded v2.3
M Maiden NameA name you had just before you got marriedadded v2.3
MSK MaskedThere is information on this item available but it has not been provided by the sender due to security, privacy or other reasons. There may be an alternate mechanism for gaining access to this information. Note: using this null flavor does provide information that may be a breach of confidentiality, even though no detail data is provided. Its primary purpose is for those circumstances where it is necessary to inform the receiver that the information does exist without providing any detail.added v2.7
N NicknameNickname /"Call me" Name/Street Nameadded v2.4
NAV Temporarily UnavailableInformation is not available at this time but it is expected that it will be available later. Includes John or Jane Doe situationsadded v2.7
NB Newborn NameA name assigned on a temporary basis at birth. i.e. "Baby of Smith"added v2.7
NOUSE No Longer To Be UsedName not to be used anymore for personal reasonsadded v2.7
O Otherdeprecatedadded v2.3, removed after v2.3
P Name of Partner/SpouseRetained for backward compatibility only as of v2.7.added v2.3.1
R Registered Name(animals only) Retained for backwards compatibility only as of v2.7. Use "L" instead - has same meaningadded v2.4
REL Religiouse.g. Sister Mary Francis, Brother Johnadded v2.7
S PseudonymCoded Pseudo-Name to ensure anonymityadded v2.3.1
T Indigenous/TribalIndigenous/Tribal/Community Name e.g. Chief Red Cloudadded v2.3.1
TEMP Temporary NameA temporary name. Note that a name valid time can provide more detailed information.added v2.7
U UnknownUnknownadded v2.3.1

name: v2.0200
title: v2 Name Type
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0200 ( Name Type)

property.description: A property that indicates the status of the concept. One of active, experimental, deprecated, retired
The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged

extension.valueString: A name assigned to a person. Reasons some organizations assign alternate names may include not knowing the person's name, or to maintain anonymity. Some, but not necessarily all, of the name types that people call "alias" may fit into this category.

Een naam toegekend aan een persoon. Redenen voor sommige organisaties om alternatieve namen toe te kennen, kunnen zijn dat ze de echte naam niet kennen of om anonimiteit te garanderen. Sommige maar niet noodzakelijk alle namen die mensen "alias" noemen vallen mogelijk in deze categorie.

A name that a person had shortly after being born. Usually for family names but may be used to mark given names at birth that may have changed later.
This is not for temporary names assigned at birth while a newborn is not yet named

Een naam die een persoon kort na geboorte had. Meestal voor familienamen maar kan worden gebruikt om namen bij geboorte te markeren die later mogelijk zijn veranderd. Dit is niet voor tijdelijke namen die bij geboorte zijn toegekend zolang een nieuwgeborene nog geen naam heeft
A name that was wrongly used in the past and is now maintained only for the purposes of searching
Een naam die in het verleden verkeerd is gebruikt en nu alleen ten behoeve van zoeken wordt bewaard
A name acquired by adoption
Een naam verkregen via adoptie
Known as/conventional/the one you use.  May also be known asa preferred name.
Bekend als/conventioneel/de naam die de persoon gebruikt. Kan ook bekend zijn als geprefereerde naam.
Fathers Name ( Patronymic Name)
Vaders' naam (Patroniem)

A name used in a Professional or Business context. Also includes writer’s pseudonym, artist’s name, stage name, street name, etc.

An example of use is where a person with multiple proper names (i.e. married) uses one of the particular names in a professional

Een naam gebruikt in professionele of zakelijke context. Hieronder vallen het pseudoniem van een schrijver, artiestennaam, podiumnaam, streetnaam, etc. Een voorbeeld is een persoon met meerdere correcte namen (bijv. getrouwd), één van deze naam in professionele context hanteert

The formal name as registered in an official (government) registry, but which name might not be commonly used. May correspond to legal name
For many people, customary name is also their official name
De formele naam zoals geregistreerd in een officieel (overheids)register, maar welke mogelijk normaal niet wordt gebruikt. Voor veel mensen is hun reguliere naam gelijk aan hun officële naam
A name you had just before you got married
Een naam die de persoon had voordat hij/zij trouwde

There is information on this item available but it has not been provided by the sender due to security, privacy or other reasons. There may be an alternate mechanism for gaining access to this information.

Note: using this null flavor does provide information that may be a breach of confidentiality, even though no detail data is provided. Its primary purpose is for those circumstances where it is necessary to inform the receiver that the information does exist without providing any detail.

Er is informatie over bekend maar deze is niet verstrekt door de zender vanwege veiligheid, privacy of andere redenen. Er is mogelijk een alternatief mechanisme om toegang te krijgen tot deze informatie. NB: Deze null flavor geeft wel informatie
Nickname /"Call me" Name/Street Name
Bijnaam/roepnaam/straatnaam/geuzennaam

Information is not available at this time but it is expected that it will be available later.
Includes John or Jane Doe situations
Informatie is niet beschikbaar op dit moment maar wordt wel op een later moment verwacht. Geldt ook voor John of Jane Doe situaties
A name assigned on a temporary basis at birth. i.e. "Baby of Smith"
Een naam die tijdelijk bij geboorte wordt toegekend. Bijv "Baby'tje Jansen"
Name not to be used anymore for personal reasons
Naam niet meer gebruiken om persoonlijke redenen
Retained for backward compatibility only as of v2.7.
Alleen voor backward compatibiliteit sinds v2.7.

(animals only)
Retained for backwards compatibility only as of v2.7. Use "L" instead - has same meaning
(alleen dieren) Alleen voor backward compatibiliteit sinds v2.7. Gebruik "L" - deze heeft dezelfde betekenis
e.g. Sister Mary Francis, Brother John
Bijv. Zuster Maria, Broeder Jan
Coded Pseudo-Name to ensure anonymity
Gecodeerde pseudonaam voor anonimiteit
Indigenous/Tribal/Community Name  e.g. Chief Red Cloud
Inheemse-/tribale-/gemeenschapsnaam bijv. Chief Red Cloud
A temporary name. Note that a name valid time can provide more detailed information.
Een tijdelijke naam. Merk op dat de geldigheid van de naam meer gedetailleerde informatie kan bevatten.
Unknown
